name: THE MINI PLANET
description:
This game is about a mini planet that enters the space station and as an Astronaut you need to destroy the planet with your Super Sonic Gun. You will find more story in the game itself and the game has a very smooth game play. If you liked the game then please leave a positive comment on it . 

NOTE- All the assets are made in the time given in the  BTP jam. all the music and graphics are made in the given time of BTP jam. 

thanks have fun playing the game.

-Wings Studios
